sub_title: Project Manager focused on Software Implementations and Process Improvements
summary:
From the first moment that I stepped into the 35.000m2 warehouse of Schneider Electric I knew one thing: “This will be my playground for the upcoming years”. The playground which would make it possible to significantly improve the current operational processes, develop myself and learn all there is to know about warehouse and project management. 

All my life I have had a natural drive to be the best and look for new challenges. Due to this drive I have had the opportunity to work in various roles over the last 8 years. As a result, this has now given me the unique ability to manage complex multi-disciplinary projects and teams.  

As a Maintenance & Methods Manager today I am overseeing a team of five engineers who contributed to a 6% saving in operational efficiency last year. Our most exciting projects have been the construction and implementation of a new canteen and the implementation of a new facility management supplier which resulted in a saving of 5% and the reduction of 2 FTE in the first year. 

I am passionate about developing individuals and building a strong team who together are able to achieve operational excellence. As inventory manager I was able to set up the best inventory control team world wide which achieved and is still maintaining an inventory accuracy of 99.5% over the last 5 years.  

I’m always interested in meeting new people so feel free to contact me if you’d like to connect at meikevanooijen@gmail.com. 

Specialties: operational management, project management, employee development, inventory control, process improvement, purchasing, Warehouse Management System (WMS), lean warehousing, 5S, continuous improvement

profile_positions.title: Project Manager IT & Tools Team BeNe cluster

profile_positions.description:
The engineering team has to ensure the efficiency of the logistics operation by applying lean and SPS rules. Key point are improving operational and IT processes and implementing preventive maintenance on all operational equipment to reduce time lost to a minimum. Manage all purchase orders for the DC, participate in RFQ's together with the NPP (Non Productive Purchasing) Manager Netherlands and implement newly selected suppliers.

Achievements:
•	Managed the implementation of new warehouse equipment (RF guns, printers, mobile carts), including the set up of Total Productive Maintenance together with the warehouse operators. Predicted saving of 700 operational hours in 2016.  
•	Supported the creation and implementation of a new purchasing tool which improved our ordering and validation process and gives management valuable information for future RFQ’s and the ability to negotiate better prices. 
•	Supervised a team of 2 engineers who contributed to a 6% increase in operational efficiency in 2015 
•	Led the constructing of a new canteen including selection and implementation of the caterer
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager

profile_positions.description:
Project manager leading the start up of 15.000m2 extended warehouse and office space in Helmond.
 
• Defined and implemented a new warehouse layout together with a team of WMS and operational experts which increased operational efficiency by 5%.
• Implemented new fixed phones, printers and the extension and upgrading of our WAN / LAN network together with our local an regional IT support teams
• Furnished new office space in collaboration with an interior designer and the management team 
• Monitored and adjusted project planning depending on building construction progress
• Organize weekly communication on project progress to stakeholders and employees
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Increased efficiency of the customs team by 30% in five months
•	Implemented direct shipments to customers saving 45k on transport cost in four months 
•	Successfully completed the GCOA (Global Change of Accounts) project (update WMS to work in euro’s instead of dollars). 
•	Managed a team of 4 supervisors
•	Led Monthly Operations Reviews (MOR) with all carriers to increase On Time Delivery Transport (OTDT) performance and reduce transport damages
•	Optimized Oracle Transport Management (OTM) system by creating new business monitors to generate a better overview for the transport planners
profile_positions.title: Planning, Transport & Customs Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed and restructured the inventory control team which resulted in the reduction of 2 FTE 
•	Increased operational efficiency with 10% by optimizing the warehouse layout and updating WMS settings 
•	Conducted weekly KPI's reports to update DC management on inventory performance versus corporate target. Implemented corrective actions to increase overall inventory performance 
•	Scored Advanced level on Inventory Accuracy during the 2011 Schneider Production System audit 
•	 Led and successfully completed yearly financial inventory audits
profile_positions.title: Inventory Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Trained the inventory control team and implemented inventory control procedures which increased inventory accuracy from 88% to 99.5% after the implementation of APC’s WMS.  
•	Implemented a new warehouse operation at ND Logistics in Oss for our Russian customers 
•	Function as a liaison between the APC team in Galway and the 3PL employees in Helmond which primarily entailed resolving operational issues to increase and maintain customer satisfaction
•	Analyzed and reduced the inventory gap between APC's Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system and DHL's (3PL) Warehouse Management System (WMS) with 4%.
profile_positions.title: Logistics Analyst
